content: (3) You put side-by-side-stereo 1 in your Config.prc file. This is similar to red-blue-stereo, above, but the two views are rendered side-by-side in the same window. This is useful for developing stereo applications, so you can see each view easily; it may also be useful for environments such as head-mounted displays where the output spans two different displays, and each display represents a different eye.
